text: Giancarlo Ferrari is a retired Italian archer. He was born on 22 October 1942. Ferrari competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics, 1976 Summer Olympics, 1980 Summer Olympics, 1984 Summer Olympics, and the 1988 Summer Olympics.Giancarlo FerrariGiancarlo FERRARI == References == Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Italian archers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Giancarlo Ferrari
